jasbro.game.items.UnlockItem.name: Dungeon Map
jasbro.game.items.UnlockItem.unlockMessage:
During the night you hear strange shuffling sounds from outside of the house. Then there is a noise, that sounds like a muffled scream. When you go outside to check, there is nothing there except for an old piece of paper, marred with splatches of blood. It is a map that points somewhere into the nearby forest.
Dungeon unlocked!
